products.title: Stitch•illo (preorder reprint)
products.body_html:
Stitch•illo is Volume S in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration, originally released in 2017. This beloved volume has been out of print for a few years, but I am happy to report that pre-orders for a reprint are now open!

The $70 CAD includes worldwide shipping. (If you're outside of North America, any import duties are the responsibility of the customer.)

(Cover art by Kelli May Krenz.)

products.title: Hidden Little U: Volume 3
products.body_html: Little U Volume 3 — this listing is for authorized contributors only.

products.title: Encyclopedia Bundle USA ONLY
products.body_html:
THIS BUNDLE SHIPS WITHIN THE USA ONLY.

*** If your shipping address is outside of the USA, some of these titles are available through Central Books in the UK. If you're in Canada, please purchase this bundle instead. ***

Get an Encyclopedia of Inspiration Library! You'll receive Feed Sacks (reprint 2019), Vintage Life (2019), Quilted (2019), Botanica (reprint 2020), Ceramics (2020) and Yarn-Thread-String (2021).

Save $17 off the total individual cover prices. Over 5kgs of books! 

Ephemera, Print/Maker and Stitch*illo are out of print and not available for purchase. Click on each books' page to register your interest in a reprint.

products.title: Encyclopedia Bundle CANADA ONLY
products.body_html:
THIS BUNDLE SHIPS WITHIN CANADA ONLY. 

Get an Encyclopedia of Inspiration Library! You'll receive Vintage Life (2019), Quilted (2019), Botanica (reprint 2020), Ceramics (2020) and Yarn-Thread-String (2021). Save $15 off the total cover price.

Feed Sacks is only available to ship from the USA. If you purchase that item separatey, please note that customs charges are your responsibility.

Ephemera, Print/Maker and Stitch*illo are out of print and not available for purchase. Click on each books' page to register your interest in a reprint.

products.title: Ephemera
products.body_html:
Limited copies are still available from from Central Books in London.

 

Ephemera is Volume E in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration. This 448-page book features gorgeous and inspiring collections of vintage ephemera along with profiles of 30 creatives who make art and business through their collections. Collage artists, illustrators, type designers, graphic designers, creative entrepreneurs and more! It has a dust jacket that can be folded to reveal one of four designs. Or you can use the dust jacket as gift wrap, collage or for another creative project.

products.title: Subscription Renewal: Starting with #51 (Oct 2021)
products.body_html:
Eager Renewal Option!

Love UPPERCASE and want to renew early? Great! Just select one or two years and we'll tack on the appropriate number of issues onto the end of your existing subscription. (You'll receive a confirmation email that lets you know your total subscription period if your renewal starts with something other than the issue indicated below).  

When you select a two-year renewal option below, you save automatically $30 off the price of two individual subscriptions! 

#51 Oct/Nov/Dec 2021
#52 Jan/Feb/March 2022
#53 April/May/June 2022
#54 July/Aug/Sept 2022

Are you renewing a subscription for someone else? Please use the Gift Subscription option and we'll treat it as a renewal, and add it to the end of their current subscription. Just use their name as it appears on their subscription.

products.title: Yarn-Thread-String
products.body_html:
This is a pre-order listing for Volume Y in the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia of Inspiration. This volume is planned to be released in March 2021. 

Updates and previews will be posted in the UPPERCASE newsletter.

Download a free poster here.

 

So much of what we make is created by using various fibres. Knitting, crochet, weaving, sewing, embroidery, rug-making, macramé and many more crafts are made possible with yarn, thread and string. 

This book gets up close and personal with fibre, telling the stories and processes from fibre farmers, thread and yarn companies to individual artisans. We'll look at natural fibres and how they are made, and how design plays a part in the visual appeal of fibre brands. We'll explore innovative fibres that repurpose and recycle our valuable resources. 

Yarn-Thread-String highlights artists, craftspeople and creative entrepreneurs who use these fibres in unique and inspiring ways. You'll gain a new and exciting perspective on what fibre is—and how we can use it to express our individuality, creativity and humanity.

products.title: Ceramics
products.body_html:
This is a 400+ page book, it is not a magazine nor is it part of a subscription. If you've already pre-ordered Volumes C and Y of the UPPERCASE Encyclopedia, thank you.

UPPERCASE publications are limited editions printed in Canada.
